azure_tenant_id.name: Azure Tenant ID
azure_tenant_id.description: Your Azure Active Directory Tenant ID. Found in Azure Portal → Azure Active Directory → Properties → Tenant ID.

azure_client_id.name: Azure Client ID
azure_client_id.description: Your Azure App Registration Client ID (Application ID). Create an App Registration in Azure Portal → Azure Active Directory → App Registrations, then copy the Application (client) ID.

azure_client_secret.name: Azure Client Secret
azure_client_secret.description: Your Azure App Registration Client Secret. Generate one in your App Registration → Certificates & secrets → Client secrets → New client secret.

azure_subscription_id.name: Azure Subscription ID
azure_subscription_id.description: Your Azure Subscription ID. Found in Azure Portal → Subscriptions → Overview → Subscription ID.

azure_resource_group.name: Azure Resource Group
azure_resource_group.description: The name of the Azure Resource Group that contains your DNS zones. Found in Azure Portal → DNS zones → Overview → Resource group.

domains.name: DNS Domains
domains.description: List of DNS zones and records to update. Each entry should specify a zone and the records within that zone. Use '@' for root domain, specific names for subdomains, or '*' for wildcard records.

ipv4_enabled.name: Enable IPv4 Updates
ipv4_enabled.description: Enable automatic IPv4 (A record) updates when your public IPv4 address changes. Default: true

ipv6_enabled.name: Enable IPv6 Updates
ipv6_enabled.description: Enable automatic IPv6 (AAAA record) updates when your public IPv6 address changes. Requires IPv6 internet connectivity. Default: false

check_interval.name: Check Interval
check_interval.description: How often to check for IP address changes (in seconds). Lower values mean faster updates but more API calls. Default: 300 (5 minutes)

ip_services.name: IPv4 Detection Services
ip_services.description: External services used to detect your public IPv4 address. Multiple services provide redundancy. Default services are reliable and free.

ipv6_services.name: IPv6 Detection Services
ipv6_services.description: External services used to detect your public IPv6 address. Multiple services provide redundancy. Only used when IPv6 is enabled.

mqtt_host.name: MQTT Host
mqtt_host.description: MQTT broker hostname. Default: core-mosquitto (the official Mosquitto addon). Change if using external MQTT broker.

mqtt_port.name: MQTT Port
mqtt_port.description: MQTT broker port. Default: 1883 for standard MQTT. Use 8883 for MQTT over TLS.

mqtt_user.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_user.description: MQTT username configured in your Mosquitto addon or external MQTT broker. Leave empty if authentication is disabled.

mqtt_password.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_password.description: MQTT password configured in your Mosquitto addon or external MQTT broker. Leave empty if authentication is disabled.

log_level.name: Log Level
log_level.description: Logging verbosity. Use 'info' for normal operation, 'debug' to troubleshoot DNS update issues, or 'warning' for minimal logging.

calendar_entity.name: Calendar Entity (Optional)
calendar_entity.description: Home Assistant Local Calendar entity ID to log DNS update events. Example: 'calendar.azure_ddns_events'. Leave empty to disable calendar integration.
